channel.title: Amkhatai on QUANTUM INFORMATION WITH TRAPPED IONS

item.title: Ali Mustafa Khatai
item.description: Ali will be joining the QuantumION team as a new Physics MSc student in fall 2023. He obtained his bachelor’s degree in Physics and Computer Science from Illinois Wesleyan University.
